title: Event Horizon
description: An events app that allows users to see event details that are nearby on a Google Map. Has in-app QR scanning for check-ins and details. User persmissions are handled based on roles.

title: Gym Buddy
description: A app that that motivates you and keeps track of your physical achievements in and out of the gym. Made to enhance my Redux toolkit skills.

title: Spam Detector
description: Spam or Ham email checker model using the Naive Bayes Algorithm

title: Data Analysis Dashboard
description: Collected industry data through WebScraping and Web APIs then cleaned and analyzed data before building a dashboard to visualize the relationships, composition and comparisons

title: Personal Portfolio
description: This is a project made to showcase my skills as well as learn react, animations, and more about front-end.
